contest-event.event-date:
July 7, 1904 D Penrith Contest
Penrith Contest 0 March Contest
penrith
Test Piece Contest
Songs of Other Days
Foundry Field, Penrith, Cumberland March contest - 1st Dalton, 2nd Great Clifton, 3rd Morr Row. Prizes - 1st £15 and cornet, 2nd £8, 3rd £4. Best cornet, euphonium and trombone - Dalton Town. Promoted by Penrith Friendly Society. 6 bands competed.
Aug. 30, 2018, 8:32 a.m. Aug. 30, 2018, 9:42 a.m.
1 Dalton Town Band John Carter
2 1st V.B. Lancs. Ulverston John Carter
3 Great Clifton Silver J. J. Fisher
4 Moor Row Old W. Heap
5 Egremont Band W. Moore
6 Kirkby Stephen Silver Band Unknown
